description: Aspose.Slides is a PowerPoint management library for working with Microsoft PowerPoint files without using Microsoft PowerPoint. It allows developers to work with PPT, PPS, POT, PPTX, PPSX, POTX and ODP files on ASP.NET web applications, web services and Windows applications.
releaseNotes:
This release introduces the features, enhancements and bug fixes as detailed below:
	
	New Feature:

SLIDESNET-33189	Support for adding Assistant node in the case of the Organization Diagram

	Enhancement:

SLIDESNET-33182	SmartArt support: create first draft version with limited API

	Investigation:

SLIDESNET-33720	Aspose.Slides - Work on iOS (iPad/iPhone)

	Bugs:

SLIDESNET-22640	NullReferenceException on saving PPTX
SLIDESNET-33171	The node TextFrame for SmartArt returns null on accessing it
SLIDESNET-33199	The table’s column data overlaps when saving the presentation
SLIDESNET-33209	Setting row height less than 2 is crashing presentation in PowerPoint 2007
SLIDESNET-33283	Fonts are bigger than in original PPTX when exported into PDF
SLIDESNET-33310	Table converted to individual text frames on setting cell height in cloned slide
SLIDESNET-33337	Issue with slides Thumbnails for PPT
SLIDESNET-33468	Setting the font related properties for predefined label properties failed
SLIDESNET-33516	Removing slide with Embedded object corrupts the generated presentation
SLIDESNET-33532	NullPointerException on cloning slides
SLIDESNET-33589	Changing the color of the pie chart sector
SLIDESNET-33629	Presentation document properties (Metadata) is not copied in exported PDF
SLIDESNET-33637	Setting Aspose.Slides license under Saudi Calendar does not work
SLIDESNET-33646	Removing column from PPTX table corrupts the presentation
SLIDESNET-33647	Poor Image Quality on GetThumbnail with Embedded OLE objects
SLIDESNET-33671	The bullet character is improperly rendered in generated XPS
SLIDESNET-33691	Saving presentation in different slide view types does not work when presentation opened in PP 2010
SLIDESNET-33710	Text is not rotated on generated thumbnails and exported PDF's
SLIDESNET-33711	Emf image is drawn differently in pdf and png.
SLIDESNET-33713	Bullets color are improperly rendered in exported PDF
summary: Aspose.Slides is a PowerPoint management library for working with Microsoft PowerPoint files without using Microsoft PowerPoint. It allows developers to work with PPT, PPS, POT, PPTX, PPSX, POTX and ODP files on ASP.NET web applications, web services and Windows applications. It allows you to open files and manipulate the elements of the presentation from adding slides and managing variety of shapes and working with text to more complex elements like presentation protection, slide animations, charts and SmartArt rendering.The presentations can be exported to PDF, TIFF, XPS, SVG, PNG, JPEG, BMP or EMF formats.
title: Aspose.Slides for .NET
